title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 2100/91 of 17 July 1991 concerning intervention in the rice sector in Portugal during the 1991/92 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 2100/91  of 17 July 1991  concerning intervention in the rice sector in Portugal during the 1991/92 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Notwithstanding Article 5 (1) of Regulation (EEC) No 1418/76, during the 1991/92 marketing year intervention buying of rice harvested in Portugal may take place in that Member State from 1 September 1991 until 31 July 1992.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 September 1991. This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 17 July 1991. For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
